title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; supports chat, completions, embeddings, and model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple Rust CLI for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with 30+ example notebooks (function calling, agents, fine-tune, RAG).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Redis, and Postgres for easy local RAG.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package and NixOS module for reproducible Ollama deployments.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but feature-complete Rust crate for Ollama (chat, embed, pull, delete).

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK (.NET 6+) with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama models via admin chat UI and REST endpoints.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service template that wraps Ollama with JWT auth, rate limits, and OpenAI-style endpoints.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you query local Ollama models from within your notes.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot bringing Ollama models to any server with slash commands.
